summary: An email exchange from July 10, 2019, regarding FBI coordination for a potential search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment. The email indicates most of the C20 team is in Florida interviewing victims and requests assistance for the New York operation.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: CC'ed on the email requesting assistance for executing a search warrant at Epstein's Manhattan residence.

events.title: Planned Search of Epstein's Manhattan Residence
events.description: C20 (likely an FBI or investigative team) may need to execute another search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence in Manhattan for digital media and computer equipment.

keyFacts: On July 10, 2019, planning was underway for a potential search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence the following day (July 11, 2019).
The search target was digital media and computer equipment.
Most of the C20 investigative team was in Florida interviewing victims at the time, necessitating a request for assistance in New York.
The email indicates active, parallel investigations in multiple locations (New York and Florida) shortly before Epstein's arrest.
